Summary: I thought it was a star until it started drifting around.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my front porch and noticed a low star.I looked away for a few seconds.I looked back thinking that was not a typical part of the sky to see a star that bright.Then I thought it moved.I'm like did that thing just move? It did.I stared at it as it sort of slowly drifted about.It seemed to be west of me above Mt.Madonna.I could not judge the distance. I decided to get in my car to get a closer look.Half way up the mountain I could still see it through the trees.When I got there it was gone.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gilroy
There were no other sightings in Gilroy on or around February 19th 2009
